summary: Just a quick conversion of EOtW's armor for the Sevenbase Female body
descriptionHtml:
Just a quick conversion of EOtW's armor for the Sevenbase Female Body

By now all of you know how to install (NMM or just drag the files into your Skyrim folder)

Requirements

Noldorian Ranger Armour http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32408/?
SevenBase Female Body http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?

Credits

I'd Like to thank FastestDogInTheDistrict for the use of his Mage Journeyman meshes for the robes and boots and his monks hood mesh http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37946/?
EOtW For the use of the textures
Wast1980 & Sevenity For The SevenBase Female Body Replacer
The Creation Kit, And last but not least...
NifSkope

Note: I'm unable to give permission for the use of these resources as they are the intellectual property of their respective creators, so if you want to modify them or what not (other than personal use) you have to obtain their permission first
author: jynx474
